#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

[http://www.gnuplot.info Gnuplot] is free, open-source software for plotting mathematical graphs.
This [https://code.google.com/p/aic-util/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/util/experiment library] provides a Java API for using Gnuplot.
<p>
Please see javadoc for more details and examples.
